ticket.title: Deprecation warning on info page
ticket.original-body:
On info page the middleware field shows a deprecation warning, that's coming from the middleware/stack.rb, active method. The info shows active middlewares, but since every middleware is active, I guess the active method is not necessary.
Here is a patch: http://github.com/Nucc/rails/commit/d0109e62080e4a9e4a78372b739372df5f812cf0

On info page the middleware field shows a deprecation warning, that's coming from the middleware/stack.rb, active method. The info shows active middlewares, but since every middleware is active, I guess the active method is not necessary.

Here is a patch:

Here is a patch: http://github.com/Nucc/rails/commit/d0109e62080e4a9e4a78372b739372df5f812cf0
version.body-html:
On info page the middleware field shows a deprecation warning, that's coming from the middleware/stack.rb, active method. The info shows active middlewares, but since every middleware is active, I guess the active method is not necessary.

Here is a patch:

version.title: Deprecation warning on info page

version.body:
Here is the warning message on the info page:
Middleware:
"DEPRECATION WARNING: All middlewares in the chain are active since the laziness was removed from the middleware stack. (called from /Users/nucc/sandbox/rails/ruby/1.8/bundler/gems/rails-f33ee69/railties/lib/rails/info.rb:92)"
version.body-html:
Here is the warning message on the info page:

Middleware:

"DEPRECATION WARNING: All middlewares in the chain are active since the laziness was removed from the middleware stack. (called from /Users/nucc/sandbox/rails/ruby/1.8/bundler/gems/rails-f33ee69/railties/lib/rails/info.rb:92)"
version.title: Deprecation warning on info page

version.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.
The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.
Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
version.body-html:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.

The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.

Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
